name: High Mountain Car Track Drivin
description:
High Mountain Car Track Driving is an ultimate project offroad for supercar crash test where you drive muscle car games. The offroad death race trials awaiting, inspired by the project offroad, impossible stunts driving school rules and top speed breaker challenge reminiscent of extreme car destruction games.
- Modify some specifications of cars such as handling, motor and brake,
- Chance of changing the color, rim and appearance of cars
- High-quality and ever-changing environment models.
- Addictive episodes that are not boring at all
- Different actions that come with new episodes
